reviews.comments: Diseño practicidad muy buen   funcionamiento temperatura ambiente seguridad acceso. Paisaje. todo de maravilla
La casa es espectacular y Nuno un gran anfitrión. Ya estamos haciendo planes para volver. Muchísimas gracias Nuno!

Una casa unica en un entorno tambien irrepetible. Espectaculares vistas y aspectos de diseño en cada uno de los ambientes invitan a quedarse y hacen que sea dificil querer salir de la casa.
Imposible mencionar todos los detalles, hay que experimentarlos en primera persona. La amabilidad y buena predisposicion de Nuno completan una experiencia unica y de excelencia.

Lo primero que tengo para contarles es que la recepción de Nuno en su casa ya es una experiencia por si sola. La casa no puede ser más linda! La vista, las habitaciones, la iluminación, la calidad. Todo! Fuimos con nuestros dos hijos y además de recorrer Bariloche, el momento de regresar a casa era muy lindo porque al llegar uno siente que sigue paseando!. El parque, el asador, la música, películas, libros. Está todo preparado para ser feliz! Muchas gracias Nuno por compartir un pedazo de paraíso! Exquisitas las frutillas y frambuesas que cosechamos de tu jardín! Vamos a volver!

La casa de Nuno, es de esos lugares donde uno se quedaría a vivir eternamente. Porque no solo la casa es espectacular, como se ve en las fotos, las vistas a la laguna son increíbles, y el interior de la casa está decorado con un gusto exquisito, propio de un amante de la decoración y el buen gusto. Todo esta cuidado hasta el más mínimo detalle.
Es muy cómoda, amplia y acogedora. Y esta super equipada.
Pasar tus vacaciones ahi realmente no tiene precio!! Fue una gran elección. Y por supuesto Nuno un gran anfitrión.
Gracias Nuno, volveremos pronto.
La casa y su ubicación son excelentes. Muy recomendable !! La amabilidad de Nuno hace que la estadía sea aún mejor. Es nuestra segunda visita y esperamos volver pronto!!!

El lugar donde está ubicada la casa es increíble!! Una vista espectacular y mucha tranquilidad. La casa es increíble, aún mejor que en las fotos, muy moderna, comoda y funcional, decorada con un gusto exquisito.. Y tiene absolutamente todo lo necesario! No nos faltó nada! Nuno es un anfitrión increíble.. nos recibió con un vinito de regalo y unas frutillas recién cosechadas, respeto nuestro espacio pero siempre atento a cualquier necesidad! 
100% recomendable, voy a volver seguro!!

La casa de Nuno es sensacional. Tiene absolutamente todo lo que necesitas para relajarte y descansar. La casa está completamente equipada   No le falta absolutamente nada por cuanto si uno desea quedarse allí mismo en la laguna disfrutando del paisaje se la pasa genial. Vale cada centavo. Y. Nuno es un excelente anfitrión. Al llegar te sugiere mil cosas para hacer y para lo que hemos necesitado nos ha ayudado al instante. Es un 10 todo.  Volvería sin dudarlo.

Lo único que resumiria nuestra estadía en esta casa es que no duden un solo segundo en elegirla. Supera lo que se espera encontrar!, todo de primera categoría: la casa en si, la decoración, la vajilla, los electrodomésticos, las camas, el blanco..... TODO TODO. 
Si bien implicó un esfuerzo el tema de pagar el precio del alquiler, la verdad que no nos arrepentimos en lo más mínimo. nos tocó muy mal tiempo en la semana que estuvimos, pero la casa era tan cómoda para cada uno de los cinco integrantes de la familia, que no lo sufrimos demasiado. La vista es impresionante y a pesar de estar sobre un calle muy concurrida, no se escucha un solo ruido desde el interior de la vivienda. Exquisita, soñada.

La casa es increíble! La vista desde todos los ambientes es soñada! Es difícil salir de ella para hacer algún paseo porque ahí encontras todo lo que necesitas, confort, tranquilidad y una excelente vista al entorno que forma la laguna. No se pierdan dar una vuelta por la laguna en el kayac!!!!
Espectacular casa con cuidados detalles de decoración.  Una vista soñada y cerca de los mejores spots de Bariloche.

La casa se encuentra en un lugar soñado. Lejos del ruido y en armonia con la naturaleza. La ambientacion y decoracion es impecable. Nuno es un anfitrion fantastico. Siempre atento para lo que uno necesite.

Sin ninguna duda fue el mejor alojamiento en un viaje de dos semanas.
Todo espectacular, la casa es tal y como se la ve en la publicación, resulta increíble estar ahí, a tal punto que nos costaba salir para hacer alguna compra o simplemente pasear, queríamos llegar para ver el atardecer y tomar un vino, dicho sea de paso Nuno nos recibió con una botella de un vino orgánico que era una delicia.
La casa tiene absolutamente todo lo que uno pueda necesitar y está arreglada con tal gusto que ha salido publicada en un par de revistas de decoración.
El paisaje que se ve desde cada ambiente y desde la terraza solo justifica quedarse ahí.
Realmente una gran pegada haber encontrado la casa de Nuno para terminar nuestro viaje.
Gracias por todo y hasta la próxima.
La casa supero nuestras expectativas, todos sus ambientes son confortables y más lindos que en las fotos. La estadía fue espectacular! El anfitrión muy atento y predispuesto. Gracias Nuno por todo!

La casa es perfecta, es más linda y confortable de lo que uno puede imaginarse. Esta súper equipada y todo funciona a la perfección. También está muy bien ubicada. Nuno el anfitrión es muy amable y está en todos los detalles. No podríamos pedir más....
Excelente casa y anfitrión!!
Saludos
Leo

Si las fotos les parecen increíbles, estar en ese lugar es 10 veces mejor! La atención de Nuno es de primera, al igual que todas las cosas a disposición en su casa. Servicio 6 estrellas. Ideal para compartir en familia o grupo de parejas jóvenes con ganas de una buena parrillada a orillas de la laguna. Sitio obligado para los amantes de la decoración y la arquitectura. Sin dudas, lo mejor que van a encontrar en Bariloche.

La casa es hermosa, tiene todo lo necesario para hacer de la estadía un placer. Lo mejor de todo es el entorno: solo se escuchan los pájaros y la vista a la laguna es impresionante. Muy recomendable, Nuno fue muy atento y cuando lo necesitamos acudió rápido. Volveremos!

Fue relamente una excelente experiencia, de la casa no se puede pedir mas, la vista es realmente hermosa, la casa es excelente y esta mas que equipada, no le falta nada¡!!! Es hermosa y confortable, la ubicacion excelente asi como sus anfitriones, Nuno siempre atento y dispuesto a lo que necesitamos, muchas gracias, vacaciones inolvidables!!!!
Excelente, calidez, calidad, cordialidad, todo diez puntos
Una casa de ensueño, en un lugar de ensueño y atendido por gente increíble. Definitivamente han subido la vara para nuestro próximo destino
La verdad que la pasamos barbaro, la casa esta impecable, las fotos reflejan fielmente la misma y Nuno muy atento.

La casa es increible, supera lo publicacion.
Es muy comoda y bien equipada con muchos detalles.
Los dueños le haran sentir mejor que en su casa.
Hemos disfrutado mucho de la casa y el lugar. 
Volveremos pronto ya bien lo vale.

Esta casa maravillosa a orillas de la Laguna del Trébol, cerca de la Colonia Suiza, del hermoso Hotel Llao Llao, y del Cerro Campanario (que ofrece una de las mejores vistas de Bariloche, muy superior a la vista del Cerro Otto, y más salvaje), sobrepasa toda expectativa. Ya las fotos posteadas en airbnb son maravillosas, pero la experiencia real la supera en todo sentido, así que imagínese lo que es. La casa es perfecta en todo sentido, está ubicada en una zona hermosa, y tiene un deck con una mesa para comer afuera, así como también un jardín abajo donde hay una parrilla y otra mesa con sillas de troncos. El jardín dirige directamente a la laguna. Es encantador. El diseño de la casa y la decoración son insuperables, y está completamente equipada, y todo funciona excelentemente bien. Las vistas del living, y de los tres cuartos es maravillosa, ya que todo da al lago. Los tres baños en suite tienen vidrio (que se puede tapar con un blackout) que da a la habitación y de ahí al exterior, por lo que uno puede estar duchándose mientras observa la naturaleza. Es fuera de serie.

Al llegar, Nuno nos esperó con un budín de chocolate, quizás una de las cosas más ricas que comí en mi vida.

Sugeriría tener o alquilar un automóvil para disfrutar de todo lo que se puede en Bariloche. 

Lo único que le vendría bien a la casa es un muellecito para acceder más facilmente a la laguna, ya que está un poco obstruido a la orilla por juncos, pero no sé si esto es posible, debido a restricciones de protección ambiental, pero sería ideal para poder disfrutar más del agua.

Nuno por supuesto es un anfitrión de primera, y estuvo a nuestra disposición en toda ocasión que lo necesitamos. La casa es muy popular (cosa que se entiende) así que los horarios de check-in y check-out son bastante estrictos. Al menos fue nuestro caso, pero fuimos en temporada alta de verano.

Millones de gracias a Nuno por habernos hecho pasar unos días tan maravillosos en tan maravilloso lugar.
Fue todo tal cual lo descripto y más todavía, la atención, recepción y comunicación durante la estadía.
Nos encantó la casa, el lugar, la atención de nuno y manu. Todos los comentarios reflejan lo espectacular que es la casa. Volveremos pronto!
Una experiencia inolvidable! La casa hermosa! Mas linda que en las fotos! La disfrutamos mucho con amigos, esperamos poder volver pronto!!!

La descripción del anuncio era correcta y el anfitrión fue muy amable, nos atendio de manera gentil y fue muy atento. La casa esta espectacular, cuidada de manera impecable, y super bien decorada. Las fotos son totalmente reales y esta muy bien ubicada. El unico inconvieniente que tuvimos fue que los baños no tienen puerta. Pero no fue demasiado terrible.
Nuno un exelente  anfitrion,la casa  aun mas bella que en las fotos ,fue mi primer experiencia con AIRBNB  y todo fue  maravilloso .
Numo, una persona increíble. Todo tal cual lo descripto en el anuncio. Fue una estadía encantadora. Gracias. 1000% recomendable.

El anfitrión no nos ha decepcionado en ningún aspecto, el contacto fue fluido en todo momento y nos sentimos muy bien atendidos. La casa era exactamente como lo esperábamos y ofrecía todo lo que prometía.
El entorno es perfecto para vacaciones tranquilas y confortables. La vista es preciosa y se disfruta de todos los ambientes. 
La casa está bien equipada, las camas son muy cómodas y todo el mobiliario y la decoración es de buen gusto y con muchos detalles de diseño. Nos fuimos con deseos de repetir la experiencia.

El lugar es mejor que en las fotos. Está impecable. La locación mejor imposible. Lo suficiente alejado del centro para disfrutar de la tranquilidad de los alrededores. 
La atención y amabilidad de Nuno es notable. Recomiendo 100%.

Estuvimos en la casa desde fines de diciembre del 2013 hasta los primeros dias de enero del 2014. Fuimos con otras dos parejas de amigos.
No tengo mas que las mejores recomendaciones. Nuno es realmente una persona especial. No es casual que los comentarios sean todos mas que positivos.  Siempre atento, super amable, presente en todos los detalles, hasta nos recibio con un pan casero recien hecho. Por cualquier consulta, su respuesta era siempre inmediata.
En cuanto a la casa, nos quedamos sin palabras. Las fotos publicadas son realmente hermosas, pero es aun mejor en persona. Diseño y confort por donde se la mire. 
La ubicacion es excelente, lejos del centro, una paz impagable,  pero en quince minutos de auto se llega sin problema. 
Todos los ambientes son comodisimos y todos tienen vista a la laguna. Nos tocaron dias frios por lo que nos quedamos con ganas de disfrutar el deck, y del exterior, que es alucinante! 
Conclusion, la recomiendo en un 1000%.

La casa es espectacular! Tal cual se ve en las fotos o incluso mejor! Nuno es un excelente anfitrión y estuvo en todos los detalles! Nos recibió con pan y mermelada casera. Estuvimos comunicados en todo momento.
La casa tiene todo lo que se necesita para una estadía perfecta, desde utensillos de cocina hasta ropa de cama y toallas.
La ubicación es genial ya que está cerca de lugares turísticos y restaurantes pero a la vez en pleno contacto con la naturaleza lo que la hace un Excelente lugar para relajarse.
Recomiendo esta casa y esperamos volver cuanto antes!

Sin dudas Nuno es EL anfitrión. Fue un placer nuestra estadia en su casa, porque él es sumamente atento en todo, con nosotros, con lo que necesitabamos, asesorandonos en que salidas nos convenia (tuvimos mucha nieve!) y muy dulce con nuestros hijos, brindandole materiales para jugar en la nieve!. La casa es aun más linda que en las fotos. Amplia, limpia, con una vista inmejorable y un exquisito gusto en su decoración. Volveremos! sin dudarlo y la recomendamos!
La casa está impecable, equipada con todo lo que uno pueda precisar para una inolvidable estadía en Bariloche. Volvería una y otra vez!

Todo ha sido muy fácil desde el principio con Nuno.
La casa espectacular, mejoró las expectativas que nos habíamos hecho.
Muy cómoda y funcional, las vistas, la ubicación perfectas!!!
El trato con Nuno muy cordial, con muy buen asesoramiento para las necesidades que nos surgían, tanto de visitas, excursiones... hasta restaurantes.
Lo recomendamos 100% !!!
Un placer haber estado en tu casa Nuno !!!
Es un lugar increible! Quedamos enamorados de la casa, cada detalle es único y junto con las vistas hacen que el lugar sea simplemente espectacular! Anfitriones 10 puntos.
Maravilloso lugar! Nuno es muy amable y nos facilito compras y tips para conocer Bariloche, realmente inolvidable, seguro volvemos el año siguiente.

Excelente anfitrión, nos espero hasta tarde para entregarnos las llaves y nos recibió con un rico brownie.

Realmente fue una excelente experiencia y la casa preciosa.

Cabaña Los Muchachos cumplio nuestras expectativas, cuando llegamos la casa es mas divina en persona de lo que muestran las fotos. La ubicacion fue perfecta. Nuno fue un amfitrion espectacular, siempre disponible para ayudarnos con cualquier inquietud. Definitivamente vuelvo a Bariloche pero solo si me vuelvo a quedar en esta cabaña. La recomiendo a ojos cerrados.

Empiezo por agradecerle a Nuno por su atención y ayuda, la estadía en Bariloche fue sensacional, la casa es mejor de lo que se ve en fotos, esta impecable es moderna y cómoda, lo que más me gusto fue el calentador de toallas que hay en los baños, al,salir de la ducha te secas con una toalla caliente cosa que en el frío agradeces mucho.   La casa ofrece muchas comodidades y la ubicación es muy buena al pie del lago, lejos del centro pero cerca de los mejores lugares para visitar.   
Sin duda volvería siempre a esta casa y a contactarme con Nuno ya que sin su ayuda no sería lo mismo de perfecto el viaje. 
Muchas gracias Nuno
Rosana de Auad

Nuno is an extremely generous and gracious host! I had booked to stay with my family at Nuno's place for 4 nights, but, much to our disappointment, our flight  from Buenos Aires to Bariloche was cancelled last-minute due to union strikes in Buenos Aires and the shutdown of both airports for 24 hours. Due to a backlog of cancelled flights, we had to postpone our trip by 5 days, at which time Nuno's place was already reserved for another group. Nuno graciously offered a full refund despite having no obligation to do so. Incredibly understanding and kind!!!

Communication with Nuno was great leading up to the trip. He was very responsive and available to answer questions as we planned our trip, and he proactively provided many recommendations.

I will absolutely plan to stay in Nuno's house on another trip to Bariloche in the future.

This house is absolutely incredible. The design and details are magazine-worthy! The location is breathtaking and the house is a total work of art architecturally. Each bedroom and nook of the house is beautifully decorated with all the comforts you could need. Every detail was completely deliberate both structurally and aesthetically. The pictures are gorgeous but still don't do it justice. You could stay at the house, kayak, grill, take in the view from the deck and never leave and it would be the perfect vacation. Nuno is also a fabulous host and gave us great recommendations. We will be finding a time to come back!!

We were welcomed at the house by Nuno's partner Manu, who was very friendly and helpful. Both Nuno and Manu gave us excellent recommendations for excursions, shopping, skiing and restaurants. The house is even more impressive than it looks in the photos. It is by far one of the most amazing houses I have ever had the privilege of staying in. The house has everything you could ever want and more (full of surprising details everywhere). The location is outstanding as the house is overlooking the Lake "El Trebol", a very quiet area with very few other houses. You feel like you have the whole lake to yourself! I couldn't recommend staying here more!

What a great place and exceptional host. It was everything and more then we expected. Very peaceful place and Nuno went above and beyond to make our vacation exceptional. He is very friendly and responsive.

I highly recommend this rental! 
1) The house is beautiful and comfortable- exactly as it is pictured in the photos. It's hard to capture the view from the expansive windows - it's absolutely gorgeous. Solid amenities and no issues whatsoever. 
2) The location is perfect - it's away from the center of the city (a positive for me) and on the main circuit where you'll probably end up driving - and most importantly, close to the Patagonia brewery!
3) Nuno was a perfect host - made my family and me feel at home immediately. Easy and flexible check-in/out. Easy to reach. Provided information on the area and house. Thank you for a wonderful stay!
Amazing experience. This house is magical. We were honored to live here. Words simply cannot describe What Nuno has created. Must go!

Stunning house and location on a smaller lagoon in the greater lake district. The house is gorgeous and every detail is special and specific. The grounds are immaculate, and the kitchen is very well stocked for an Airbnb rental--everything you need to cook really well in terms of equipment. It is an extremely relaxing house with a beautiful deck, and Nuno is lovely and very helpful. Highly recommended!

Dear Nuno:  Thank you so very much for a fantastic stay at Los Muchachos!  We had a truly memorable and amazing experience.  Your home was sincerely a comfortable and beautiful retreat and extremely special. We did not want to leave.  The only thing missing was meeting you in person.  Emmanuel -  Thank you is not enough.  We are so incredibly grateful for your hospitality and kind assistance.  The home fantastic and beyond our expectations. A truly extraordinary experience!  We plan to return.  Thank you again!  Saludos- Lisa y Pablo y Familia!  Fuerte Abrazo!

FENOMENAL is the word to better describe this house. I was there with my husband and 4 kids (ages 6 to 12). Bariloche is so pretty and amazing but I would say that the best moments we shared together were in this gorgeous house.  Clean, elegant, good taste in every aspect, extremely comfortable and the best host someone can ask for. Truly a great find on airbnb.

Don't look any further. Do yourself a favor and stay in this house that is right on circuito Chico. I rented a car. But it is totally  doable on a bike. A little stretch to the center though. About 20 min by car.

Amazing memories that we will being with us forever.
A casa é maravilhosa, extremamente comfortável, bem equipada e a vista é incrível. Nuno é muito atencioso e disponível. Passamos dias maravilhosos ali e já queremos voltar!
Second year in a row in Nuno's amazing piece of paradise. A fully equipped and very comfortable modern house in Bariloche's best location. I wouldn't go anywhere else.

A casa é ótima, como mostram as fotos! O Nuno, anfitrião, dá todo apoio que precisamos! A casa é super bem equipada, tem tudo o que precisamos. Só fica afastada do centro, pra tudo precisa de carro... E vale a pena alugar carro, porque táxi é bem caro.. Dá uns 100 reais pro centro.
Perfect! Perfect! Both home and host. The large number of positive evaluations is justified!

Local perfeito para quem procura tranquilidade e conforto. Todos os comentários que li antes de reservar são, de fato, verdadeiros. A localização é excelente, a casa moderna e aconchegante. o Visual incrível, com ou sem neve. Nuno é um excelente anfitrião.

This place is fantastic and Nuno is the perfect host. Quick to offer help and answer any questions we cannot say enough about him and this incredible home. Our rental car was conveniently parked inside the automatic secirity gate and the location was

Quando procurava uma casa em Bariloche e encontrei esta casa do Nuno, pensei comigo que era uma casa de revista - e é mesmo! A casa, a localização, a churrasqueira, a surpresa de encontrar uma horta de morangos maduros... E Nuno foi um host muito atencioso e simpático. Em suma, todas expectativas foram superadas!

Amazing stay in a truly amazing house - Nuno is an excellent host and has a dream place by the lake in Bariloche. The place is even better than it looks in the pictures and there is nothing that we would fault about it. We loved our stay here and can't recommend it enough. Thank you Nuno and hopefully we can return soon!

The most stunning house I have ever stayed in, in a perfect location on the beautiful circuitous chico. Very well equipped and looks exactly as shown in photos. Nuno is a very helpful and gracious host, giving great recommendations and responding promptly to any queries. A wonderful place to stay in Barriloche.

Nuno was a perfect host.  Responded promptly to all our inquiries.  His suggestions were great.  He even had a fresh bowl of cherries and wine for us upon arrival.  The home was everything and more.  Loved the home, furnishings, setting, and location!  Would love to have stayed longer!    Nuno was a perfect gracious host!
Beyond words.

Nuno´s house is absolutely amazing. It´s a stunning place. Everything in the house is perfect. The direct view of the lagoon is one of a kind. The decoration is meticulous and breaths excellent taste. The home is spacious and secluded in nature. We had a memorable stay at Nuno´s house. Nuno is a top notch world class host. It´s a phenomenal house that makes it so hard to leave. Recommendable all across the board. Thank you Nuno !
Une maison au bord du lac magnifique, décoration contemporaine et beaucoup de charme , propice à des vacances en famille

Nuno was the perfect host with good communication before and during our stay and even going to the supermarket to make sure we had everything we needed on our first night/morning as we were arriving late. The house is beautifully designed and feels very luxurious and is located  on an atmospheric small lake with fantastic views only 20 minutes drive outside Bariloche. We loved staying here and highly recommend it to anyone thinking of coming to Bariloche.

Really enjoyed our stay in Bariloche Argentina!  Nuno's place is a dream, even better than the photos!  He was very kind and helped me decorate the house with flowers to make it special.  He was also very accommodating with an early check in and check out.  It was a very positive experience,  a fantastic getaway - more than I even imagined!

Nuno foi muito simpático e gentil. Ele ofereceu informações importantes sobre lugares e restaurantes, que nós adoramos. A casa é mais maravilhosa que o anúncio, simplesmente um sonho. O lugar é próximo de restaurantes e de mercados, perfeito.

Lugar perfeito e anfitrião perfeito. A casa é espetacular, em um lugar privado e pitoresco. Tudo é de extremo bom gosto e qualidade. Por ter sido projetada pelo proprietário para sua própria vida no local, tudo foi pensado para acolher e ser prático ao mesmo tempo. Passamos 10 dias e nos pareceu pouco. Nos sentíamos tão em casa que havia dias que nem dava vontade de sair!
Nuno é gentil e presente, nos atendeu super bem e nos ajudou sempre que precisamos, respondendo de imediato. Bariloche tem uma natureza incrível e muitos lugares interessantes para comer e se divertir. A casa está justamente no melhor ponto da região, ou seja, melhor impossível!
Words cannot describe how incredible this place was nor what a pleasure it was having Nuno guide us through a wonderful Airbnb experience and an extraordinary stay in Bariloche!

Words are not enough to describe what an amazing experience we had at Nunos beautiful house. Every corner of the house is well thought and tastefully decorated, the view is outstanding and the experience unforgettable. 
We would come back again and again and highly recommend it to anyone looking for rest, good taste and comfort. 
Thanks Nuno for sharing such a treasure!
Nuno's home is absolutely spectacular! Even more beautiful than the pictures. We enjoyed every minute. Nuno was also very helpful in orienting us to the area and provided excellent recommendations.

I wish I could give this airbnb 10 stars instead of 5.  We absolutely loved it and wanted to live there full time.  The house is beautiful, modern and comfortable.  Every detail has been considered.  It has floor to ceiling windows, hand crafted stone walls, poured cement floors, and modern steel and wood details.  It overlooks a small lagoon and there are no other houses in view.  All you see when you wake up, cook, or hang out in any part of the house are trees, lake, mountains.  The house has been written up in what would be the Dwell magazine of Argentina, and it’s easy to see why. There is a huge open plan living room, dining room and kitchen with a gorgeous deck overlooking the lake.  There are three bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, all overlooking the lake and very private.  The kitchen was a joy to cook in, and well stocked with kitchen basics, great pots & pans and dish ware.  The owner, Nuno, is a delight. So incredibly kind, friendly and wonderful.  He had a bottle of local wine for us when we arrived and brought us homemade prune jam during our stay.  He is definitely a super host. There were fresh flowers in every room, including freshly picked lavender from the yard outside.  There is an outdoor grill that and eating space that is very rustic and beautiful.  There is a sit-on-top kayak you can use to explore the lagoon.  All the linens and bedding are high quality.  The house is about a 20 minute drive from Bariloche but there are lots of restaurants and things to do right around the house. We never once went back into Bariloche.   Don't think twice about booking this house; it is amazing.
It was our first AirB&B experience. The house is just amazing and the view is incredible. Nuno is a great host. The only regret is we didn't stay for longer.

We have stayed in many Airbnb's, but Nuno's house was by far the best so far. 
The location, away from the busy city scene of Bariloche, on a quiet lot overlooking a lagoon, was perfect. 
The house is a stunning architectural achievement, from its green roof, to its passive solar wall of windows in the lagoon side of the house. Nuno has decorated the house with beautiful art, and lovely, comfortable furniture. 
The bedrooms all have great beds and fabulous linens. Everywhere you look, there are lovely works of art and beautiful lighting. 
The showers are large, have great water pressure and lots of hot water. Nuno also has great, thick towels. 
The kitchen is very well equipped, and the appliances are modern and easy to use. It is great fun cooking, and eating, in this beautiful home. 
Nino is a fantastic host!!! The best. He answers emails quickly, and he spent a lot of time with us on check-in, giving us restaurant and hiking recommendations. 
My husband and I give Nuno and his house out very highest recommendation.

Wow! What a place...
The house is simply amazing. Without a doubt it was one of the highlights of our trip.
Nuno was a great host and supported us with various tips of what we can do around Bariloche.
If this place is available, you should book it!

This is hands-down the coolest home I have seen. Every aspect of it is intentional and extremely well designed. You can watch the sun rise over the lagoon from any of the 3 bedrooms. You can have an asado down by the grill underneath a canopy of trees. You can sit at the edge of the green roof and take in the incredible scenery.  
The home is also well situated for exploring the area around Bariloche.  It's right at the start of the Circuito Chico. Plenty of amazing drives, hikes and vistas a short distance away.  Porto Pañuelo is close by, where you can take a boat trip to Isla Victoria. The Swiss Colony is close, too.  
The thought that Nuno put into designing this home is evident in his treatment of his guests, as well.  He is an excellent host, very kind, thoughtful and accommodating.  He had great suggestions for things to do while we were here, restaurant recommendations, etc. Not to mention his great collection of design and travel books from around the world!
All in all, I can't recommend this place highly enough. Thanks Nuno!

Green Roof House from Nuno was a gorgeous experiance. 

We arrived at noon and Nuno welcomed us warmly. After a technical tour through the house and very helpful informations about the area (supermarkets, restaurants, must-have places etc) he left, letting us know we always could get in touch with him, if there were problems or questions.
The house was so cosy, familiar and friendly, everything a guest could need was in place , in the kitchen (of course all pots and pans and usual stuff but even the mixer I prefer at home), in the bathrooms (beside very clean, white and thick towels, warm light and a great shower: MUSIC - to plunge into your own bathroomdream) , in the sleepingrooms ( extra warm blanket in the wardrope, floorlight for the night, spectecular view directly on the lake - especially fantastic at dawn). The terrasse with the chairs is a dream for itsself - directly on the sunny side of life - a perfect place to come down and relax. The outdore grill in the garden was the perfect aid for dinner: delicious meet and fish, freshley grilled with salad and potatoes - the perfect end of a marvelous day.
Situated not far from Bariloche, just 5 miles from the next very well organized supermarket, in the middle of an impressive nature with lakes, mountains and very clear, well breathing air - it's the place to be! All of us (parents and 2 grown up daughters) are convinced!!!!
Summery:
Host: excellent, empathic, likes to have guests, great host
House:  hard to find something better - excellent, excellent, excellent

We loved to make this experience. Thank you!
Family Drechsler (Thomas, Heike, Carla and Luisa)

One of my best ever Airbnb experiences, of many. Nuno's house (which he built and designed himself) is stunning. The photos don't do it justice. Each bedroom is gorgeous and the lake setting is wonderful- you're close to everything (10 min drive from the Llao Llao, jumping-off point for boat trips, 10 mins from a supermarket) but the location is completely private. 

We celebrated my father-in-law's 60th birthday and had intended to go out for dinner, but had to stay in because the house was just too tempting! The BBQ outside is great, too. 

You definitely need a car.

Thanks so much, Nuno- hope to be back at some point!

Whenever you've found this house here on airbnb, you are lucky. Because this beautiful hideout in a stunning landscape is really breathtaking. It is situated on a a lake, in which you can swimm and have at the same time a great view to the panorama of the Patagonian mountains. It is some km's away from Bariloche, so you can enjoy the nature for yourself. On the other hand it is easily to reach by car. 

The house has a unique architecture with a lot of natural materials like stone, wood and fabrics. All the interior is very tastefull: elegant but functional, asthetic but comfortable. The furniture fits perfect, the kitchen is fully equipped (so you cook and do even a barbeque) and the wide glass front makes you feel sitting directly in the nature. From every bedroom you can see to the lake, in the night to the sky (yes, sometimes you see the southern cross, well, maybe I imagined that only;-))) – perfect!

Last but not least you have a great terrace where you can eat and sit and a big lawn where you can sunbath or just play some outdoor games.

I rented the house for one week with friends and we all were so happy in the end because you could relax. 

The reason for that was also Nuno, a perfect host. He helped us to come from airport there, showed us the various possibilities of outdoor activities, recommended several restaurants. He was so friendly, warmhearted and helpful and made our stay to an unforgettable experience.

The only thing you need in the aerea is in my opinion a car to come around.

Had a FABULOUS time at Nunos place in Bariloche. He was super accommodating, and so helpful with tips on what to do, where to eat, etc. the looks just as beautiful in person as it does in the photos. If I could, I would find a place to move to Bariloche and live here! Can't wait to come back.

The house is just beautiful and the views of the lagoon are so peaceful and relaxing.
We traveled with my parents and our two children (12 & 13 years old). Everyone had their own nice large bedroom in suite with spectacular views of the Laguna Trebol.
The kitchen and living room were great for the family to get together every morning for breakfast and good conversation.
We highly recommend this house.
Nuno was a great host! We have only good things to say about him.
Thank you Nuno!!! 
We will see you next year!!

O Nuno é muito querido e extremamente atencioso. Nos recebeu muitíssimo bem e, realmente, nos sentimos em casa. 
A casa é muito charmosa e confortável. Tivemos dias incríveis. Repetiremos com certeza!

Fomos surpreendidos satisfatoriamente, a atenção do Nuno e do seu sócio foi exemplar, a casa superou todas as nossas expectativas.
Limpeza impecável, instalações funcionando perfeitamente,  roupas de banho e de cama perfeitas, todos os equipamentos de cozinha em perfeito estado, instalações com o funcionamento perfeito. 
A Arquitetura e decoração de muito bom gosto e consciência estética deixam a casa extremamente aconchegante.
O Visual do Lago é incrível.
Recomendo, foi uma experiência muito prazerosa.
Nuno, obrigado.

A casa é simplesmente maravilhosa! Tudo exatamente como vemos nas fotos. E é ainda mais bonita pessoalmente.  A paisagem é deslumbrante! 
Os cômodos são espaçosos e muito confortáveis.  A cozinha tem todos os eletrodomésticos e utensílios para preparar as refeições. A roupa de cama, banho e os travesseiros são de excelente qualidade. A limpeza estava impecável.
Nuno é extremamente gentil e atencioso. Desde o primeiro contato e durante nossa estadia, sempre respondendo aos emails com rapidez. Nos recomendou vários restaurantes e bares, além de orientar sobre a cidade. E nos recebeu com um delicioso bolo de chocolate! Muito obrigada pelo carinho!

Our family of four plus another adult & child spent six wonderful days at the Green Roof House. The house and views are simply stunning and Nuno is a warm and wonderful host. The place is not only stylish but also extremely comfortable and contained everything we needed to make our stay memorable. Two of my favorite things were the terrific showers that look out onto the lagoon and the excellent wood-burning stove that faces the kitchen/dining area. The kids enjoyed the private yard and the small dock out to the water, and, of course, the thrill of being able to go onto the grassy roof to watch the sunset. The listing description is completely accurate -- the house is just as it appears in the pictures only better. Nuno gave us great recommendations for restaurants and things to do in the area, and was incredibly responsive throughout the entire process. The location of the house was perfect -- a little away from the bustle of the town, but not far from lots of restaurants and outdoor activities -- far preferable to being located in the center of town. I highly recommend this house - we had an amazing stay there!
Nuno was a great host. Always available! We enjoy the house, weather want nice so we spend most of the in the house enjoying the lake and view. The property is awesome
The welcome, the house, the situation and the equipments, everything is simply perfect and exceptional. We'll return without hesitating. Thank you Nuno!
Incrível a casa! Passamos a semana do reveillon e adoramos o lugar, não queríamos sair da casa. Nuno nos ajudou com tudo que precisamos.

Nuno is a thoughtful and delightful host. He greeted us at the house with a bottle of wine and a delicious homemade dessert, walked us through the house, giving us useful and accurate information and answering our questions about the area.

The house is perfect - better than the pictures, ideal location, gorgeous views, privacy...really could not be better.

This is a wonderful house with a great host.

Quite possibly the most epic house we have ever stayed!

We had the pleasure to stay 1 month at this beautiful oasis in Patagonia. Our host could not have been better. Welcoming from the beginning through to the end. "Above and beyond" would be how I would explain his hospitality. 

The pictures on the airbnb are great, but it is even more amazing in person. The woodwork, stone and decorating of the house was the most pleasant, warm feeling one could imagine, with the eco-Green flair. There was a lot of time and hard work put into this sustainable construction . We could have not asked for a better place, and location, for our vacation. 

Perfectly located outside the town of Bariloche, and a very close proximity to great restaurants, beautiful hikes and snowboarding. Our host set us up with "top ten" lists of "places to go", "things to do", hiking trails, you name it. I did a lot of research before coming, but he has it all ready for you upon arrival.

 We were blessed to see all 4 seasons in one month; leaves falling, spring flowers, white-outs of snow, and warm, t-shirt sunshine. And we were pleasantly awoke each morning with only the sounds of birds around the lagoon. I would recommend this house to anyone.  (P.s. "heated towel racks!!!")

O Nuno foi muito agradável em todas as oportunidades que nos encontramos ou nos falamos. Nos recebeu com grande gentileza, oferecendo-nos um pão delicioso e um vinho orgânico, da região. A casa, capa e matéria da edição de julho de uma revista de decoração argentina, é fantástica e corresponde às fotos publicadas no site. Realmente, é uma casa confortável e muito bem equipada para 6 pessoas. É decorada com várias peças sofisticadas e de design, arrematadas por Nuno em outros países como Espanha e Indonésia, por exemplo. A localização é um pouco afastada do centro (rua Mitre etc), mas o caminho é tão lindo que passa rápido. O ideal é alugar um carro para a temporada nesta casa, em Bariloche. Boa viagem!
The reservation was canceled 65 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Amazing house by the lake, a 6* property! We stayed at Nuno's house for a week with 2 children and an infant. We had bad weather the entire stay, fortunately the house has really comfortable living area and well equipped kitchen. The view to the lagoon is amazing. Everything as seen on the photos. 
We love the location, there are a couple of big supermarkets, many restaurants, cafes and shops. Everything can be reached withing 5 minutes drive.
Thanks Nuno again for borrowing the baby cot for us and all your help during the stay.

This was by far the best place that we stayed in during our whirlwind vacation to Argentina, and possibly the best place I have stayed in all of my years of travel. The view is jaw dropping. The house is stylish yet warm and cozy. Every bedroom feels private but includes a wall of windows looking out on the lake. We stayed here with our children and in-laws. It was completely perfect. Nuno was fantastic. He was very quick to respond and incredibly pleasant. He helped us with check-in and check-out and was available at a moment's notice. I would not only love to stay here again, I'd love to buy the house and live here all the time!

A propriedade é Maravilhosa! A casa é de um acabamento e bom gosto além de casas para aluguel! (existem alguns pequenos detalhes que já foram passados para o proprietário mas esse já estava tomando providencias) O lugar aonde está a casa é espetacular, como um Oasis privativo! Só vendo de perto para entender! A cozinha é excelente, quase chegando a Gourmet para quem gosta...
A pessoa do Nuno é um caso a parte, é uma pessoa especial, que sabe receber as pessoas de uma forma acolhedora. Nos recebeu com Pão Fresco feito por ele mesmo e uma garrafa de vinho orgânica! Um gesto esplendido para quem está chegando de uma viagem cansativa!
Ajustando alguns detalhes, pode ser dizer: Excelente!!!

Ficamos hospedados por 6 noites nessa casa incrível. O lugar é maravilhoso. A casa foi projetada de tal forma, que mesmo que esteja frio do lado de fora, ela permanece quente. Projeto lindo, vista linda. Hospitalidade e atenção do Nuno nos impressionou muito. Recomendo e voltarei.

The Green Roof House is a wonderful place to stay. Close enough to town to get all you need, but far enough away to enjoy real tranquility. The house is brand new, with every mod-con you can think of. The owners are really nice and can't do enough to help you make the stay an enjoyable. I will definately come back !
